properties.name: rays3d.renderdb.rest.url
properties.description: The configured :render-db REST URL -- e.g., http://localhost:8080/renderdb

properties.name: rays3d.renderdb.rest.host
properties.description: The configured :render-db REST hostname -- e.g., localhost

properties.name: rays3d.renderdb.poll.duration
properties.description: Polling-interval used when checking for new render-descriptors in the render-db. E.g., '100' (100 milliseconds), '60s' (60 seconds), '5m' (5 minutes).
